data.title: Save last map by name not hash, auto-enable developer cheats and live rule reloading when modifying maps while the game is running
data.body:
Every time I change something on a map I have to
1) start the OpenRA-Game
2) Select the Map
3) Turn Debug-Mode on
4) Ingame activate the Cheats (for testing)
5) testing and close the Game
And if I change one small thing I have to do all 5 steps

suggestion1) The Map what was choose the last time is saved in settings.yaml

suggestion2) You can (actually) define in map.yaml with Cheats: true that debug is activated. Maybe you can also choose what Cheats are at game-start activated

suggestion3) This utopian but maybe it is possible to take over the changes from map.yaml without restarting  the game

data.title: Fullscreen and Pixel Doubling --> maybe resolution change?
data.body: My screen resolution is 2560 x 1440 and it's not good to play in this reolution because you see the whole map and everything is very small. So I change my resolution to 1600 x 900. Maybe it is possible to change the resolution in game? Or the Pixel Doubling would include the Build-Palett etc.

data.title: BuildLimit - Bug
data.body:
If I define to a building (XZ) "BuildLimit: 2" (for example) and another building (YZ) Prerequisites: building XZ

then you can build building YZ without build XZ.

--> The BuildLimit satisfies the Prerequisites

data.title: Second column for SupportPowerIcons
data.body:
If you have to many SupportPowers they are outside the screen. Maybe you can fix it with more columns.

data.title: Changelog and Folders in map.oramap
data.body:
I would prefer if you can put a rules.yaml and sequences.yaml file in the oramap-package. (for better structuring)

It would be also heart if you can implement a change log in map.yamls because i make many map-updates and the players ask me whats new there.

data.title: Opacity
data.body: Maybe you can add "opacity:" to sequences.

data.title: Map Versions in Map Chooser?
data.body:
I make many updates of my Map but others also make updates. It would be great if in map.yaml would be a point "MapVersion:" and in the select bar ingame you can select the versions of the map. Otherwise the players have 20-30 KID-Maps in the mapchooser.

data.title: incompatible versions (old release V.S. playtest-20131102)
data.body:
In the new playtest all maps have to change
- CarpetBomb: Weapon: ParaBomb to AttackBomber: Armament: Weapon: ParaBomb
- Capture trait to ExternalCapture
- LegacyCapture trait to Capture.
- and more?

I mean it makes many maps unplayable because not every map would be updated and i don't see why its necessary to change it.

data.title: AirstrikePower Flare doesn't work (playtest-20131102)
data.body: In the new playtest-20131102 the Flare only appears for a very short moment.

data.title: Keyboard Shortscuts are broken (playtest-20131102)
data.body:
Keyboard Shortscuts are broken

1) For example F2-Debugmenu doesn't work
2) Ctrl and alt (on OS X) select unit building without defined hotkeys

data.title: Added 2 new settings for unit health bars (fixes #3867)
data.body:
Added two new settings:
- Always show status bars (can also be toggled with the `insert` hotkey). Default is off.
- Team health colors (this is a dota-style coloring for health bars: green (friendly), tan (neutral), red (enemies)). Default is off.

Selectable.cs - removed 'self' parameter from the draw *bars functions, since self is already a property of the class. The parameter is a relic from when bars used to be drawn in the WCWidget.

Also made the settings UI a bit taller.

data.title: Yaks on Airfields
data.body:
i had 3 airfields with three yaks parked and re-arming.
When i double click ONE yak, it selects this yak and all of the airfields (instead of all the yaks, as it should be
![yakss](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4096925/1460140/b3fa3dd2-4413-11e3-82cf-a6788227a91f.jpg)
)

data.title: Enlarge the "components frame" of the Windows Installer
data.body:
![installer](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1732773/1460016/c39b3116-4408-11e3-8bd5-e3e41dd8544d.gif)

A simple UI modification could make this installer not hide Portable Installation and Desktop Shortcut (and without even make the whole window larger).

data.title: Can't launch the Playtest.20131022 on Linux Mint 15
data.body:
I could install openra_playtest.20131022_all.deb without any problem on Linux Mint 15 but when I try to launch the game it doesn't work.

When I try to launch OpenRA from the Mint (Start) Menu, nothing happens.

When I type 'openra' in a terminal, here is what I see:
http://pastebin.com/GpR1t6V0

Here is the content of the /usr/games/openra file:
http://pastebin.com/7h83QiVv

data.title: Customize the .openra folder location
data.body:
In some cases, it could be useful to be able to customize the .openra ("OpenRA" on Windows) folder location during installation. 

There could be an option in the installer to choose the destination folder of this folder that contains mods assets, log files and the settings.yaml file.

data.title: A simple fix for dogs vs barrels.
Support runtime music installation in RA.
data.body: This is one of the most common requests on all of our support channels, and has been supported for a long time in C&C.

Attacking a barrel with a dog crashes the game
